ygData.subject: RE: [shadowknight] Name change / Some quesstions
ygData.msgSnippet: Sabbat s right.  Kill Lynuga to raise Basher and Nightkeep faction.   Here s what you do if you want the Brutechopper or Midnight mallet and keep your faction
ygData.messageBody:
RE: [shadowknight] Name change / Some quesstions

Sabbat's right.  Kill Lynuga to raise Basher and Nightkeep faction.   Here's what you do if you want the Brutechopper or Midnight mallet and keep your faction even.   Give her the Ruby.   Get the item.   Then, Kill her!  HAHAHAHA.  Your faction may even out....I don't know.   I've never completed the quest.

-----Original Message-----
From: (Sabbat) [mailto:vtemplarv@...]
Sent: Tuesday, March 07, 2000 5:30 PM
To: shadowknight@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [shadowknight] Name change / Some quesstions


From: "(Sabbat)" <vtemplarv@...>

<snip>
er im pretty sure lyunga lowers sk guild (nightkeep) and Basher faction. at
least it does when you do the Ruby quest. might be wrong as ive never
killed her

Squig.
<snip>

The Ruby quest does lower faction with those groups, but that is because you
are helping her and not killing her. :-)

--
Sabbat
